page.title: 13COUNCILLOR JAMES (MARKS TEY)
page.content: {Mr James}has lived in Marks Tey for 17 years , but he is no ordinary 59 year old . He is Chairman of the Parish Council ,a Borough Councillor , a School Governor and probably the most important,ex Mayor of Colchester(1982) He was very proud to be Mayor of the oldest recorded town and it gave him an opportunity to do good for Colchester, to visit places and to meet people.On the Parish and Borough Councils his job is to put forward the views of the local people and to see that everything runs smoothly for them. His job was a safety officer with British Rail . He and his family moved to Marks Tey because of the good cmmunications, the countryside and the house prices. He got into local politics because he felt that the views of the new housing were not represented. (A.Hall)
